title: organizing fonts (on a mac)
content: I'd like to streamline my fonts, but I don't want to do anything I'll later regret. Is there a way I can make only certain fonts appear in certain programs?
author: popluhv

comments.content:
Most font management programs can create set lists that activate specific fonts when certain programs or even documents are launched.

Linotype Font Explorer X and Extensis Suitcase Fusion are popular examples.
Is there a way to choose fonts for particular programs in Font Book?

no in font book you can't do that... but giv it a try on the Linotype Font Explorer it is the one i use!
